Title: Expands the veterans tuition awards program
Summary: Expands the veterans tuition awards program to include all persons who were honorably discharged and were residents of the state before and after serving in the armed forces of the United States; provides veterans an award equal to the in-state tuition paid at a state university for each semester the veteran is engaged in undergraduate, graduate or vocational study.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding eligibility under the veterans tuition awards program
